name: Bully Busters
description:
'Bully Busters' is a gamified interactive story for children(aged 7-12 years) to explore choices when faced with Bullying.

Children can explore the consequences of how they respond to bullying. The story paths cover responses like ignoring, standing up for themselves, fighting back, or seeking help from a grown-up. 

A mild form of bullying is portrayed in the story so that the children are not frightened.

Children earn badges when they explore various story paths. This motivates them to cover all the response options. A short summary of what constitutes bullying and why some kids bully is included at the end of the story. A list of bullying behaviors is provided so the children who are unknowingly displaying these behaviors are encouraged to stop.
